conversation.speaker: them
conversation.text: Hey bestie! How's life on Mars?

conversation.speaker: you
conversation.text: uh huh. It's... I dunno... kinda intimidating. Everyone's so much cooler than me!

conversation.speaker: them
conversation.text: That's a low bar. HEYOOOO jk jk, we both know that's not true.

conversation.speaker: you
conversation.text: Maybe. The scenes are all so different from the ones on Earth, I don't know where I'll fit in.

conversation.speaker: them
conversation.text: You'll fit in anywhere you want. Just pick a scene and go for it!

conversation.speaker: them
conversation.text: For real. Do it now. Pick a scene right now. Tell me who your new friends will be.

conversation2.speaker: you
conversation2.text: The $scene kids seem like they might be fun. You really think I can do it?

conversation2.speaker: them
conversation2.text: Absolutely. If you're not eating at their table by Friday, I owe you a Moon Rock.

conversation2.speaker: you
conversation2.text: ...please don't mail a can of soda halfway across the solar system.

conversation2.speaker: them
conversation2.text: Hey. I do what I want.
